component.name: Emoji Mart
component.summary: A modern popup emoji picker, based on the Emoji Mart web component.

description.p: Modern emoji picker popup for desktop, based on the Emoji Mart web component.
Launch the emoji picker with your system custom shortcuts `Alt+Space`, and select emojis to paste in the clipboard.

ul.li: 🍾 Built as a popup: quick invocation through the system custom shortcuts, and disappears when not needed, does not stay as a standalone window, does not run in the background
🔎 Search text box automatically focused and ready to type when invoked
⌨️ Can use the keyboard to navigate and select emojis
⚔️ Cross-platform, can be installed natively on Linux, MacOS, or Windows
🧑‍🚀 Uses modern, flexible and lightweight technologies (Tauri, TypeScript, and Solid JS), making it easier to maintain and build upon in the future
✒️ Selected emoji automatically pasted to your currently focused app (on Linux X11 only)
